issue.title: Splitwise Clone
issue.body:
## Overview
Simple expense-sharing app for friends.

## Features
- Google OAuth login
- Create groups
- Add expenses, split equally
- View balances

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 14
- Tailwind + shadcn/ui
- SQLite (better-sqlite3)
- NextAuth.js

## Pages
- Landing, Login, Dashboard, Group detail

ems.task: Initialize Next.js 14 project with TypeScript, configure Tailwind CSS and shadcn/ui, setup better-sqlite3 database with schema, configure NextAuth.js with Google OAuth provider, create .gitignore, package.json, tsconfig.json, and environment configuration files

analysisSummary: Implement a Splitwise clone expense-sharing app with Google OAuth authentication, group management, equal-split expense tracking, and balance visualization using Next.js 14, shadcn/ui, SQLite, and NextAuth.js.

pendingEMs.task: Implement authentication flow with NextAuth.js Google OAuth, user session management, database models and migrations for users/groups/expenses using better-sqlite3, and API routes for CRUD operations on groups and expenses

Build all UI components and pages using shadcn/ui: landing page, login page, dashboard with group list, group detail page with expense list and add expense form, and balance visualization showing who owes whom
Implement expense splitting algorithm (equal split), balance calculation logic to determine debts between users, and integrate balance display into group detail page with visual indicators
